Name: Boo Party
About the game: Recruited by a sketchy scientist, your job is to enter the site of paranormal disturbances and come back with photographic proof of ghosts and monsters. Sexy Proof! Boo Party might look scary at first but come on inside and you'll find it's not so bad! Explore the mansion at your own pace, complete missions for interesting characters, and finally... take those photos! Get ready for a fun and sexy adventure that will make you smile. 12 cool Ladies to meet and photograph! Secret optional photos to collect, too! Minigames, Microgames, and even the arcade smash, Succu-Bouncer! (What do you mean you've never heard of it?) Spooky, kooky and groovy soundtrack by OSC! Set lewdness level (or block it entirely) with in-game controls
